entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: stephane957/Boggle-Battle: Boggle Battle is a real-time multiplayer implementation of the classic word game, built for head-to-head competition between two players. This lightweight project combines React for responsive frontend interactions with a Flask backend and SQLite database to manage game state and word validation.
entry.content: Boggle Battle is a real-time multiplayer implementation of the classic word game, built for head-to-head competition between two players. This lightweight project combines React for responsive frontend interactions with a Flask backend and SQLite database to manage game state and word validation.

entry.title: meliodas-sama1248/Motion-Detector-Chrome-Extension: A simple and lightweight Chrome Extension that uses the webcam to detect motion in real-time. It leverages pixel difference analysis to track movement and display a visual notification when motion is detected.
entry.content: A simple and lightweight Chrome Extension that uses the webcam to detect motion in real-time. It leverages pixel difference analysis to track movement and display a visual notification when motion is detected.

entry.title: Sidmaz666/peachy: Peachy is a very minimal, lightweight, secure, and reactive front-end framework designed for building Single Page Applications (SPAs). It offers a robust state management system (local, global and global with persistence), file-based routing, and a component-based architecture with full reactivity.
entry.content: Peachy is a very minimal, lightweight, secure, and reactive front-end framework designed for building Single Page Applications (SPAs). It offers a robust state management system (local, global and global with persistence), file-based routing, and a component-based architecture with full reactivity.

entry.title: diesel-core/diesel: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
entry.content: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
